含义: The character '江' means 'river', specifically referring to large rivers. It is often used in the names of major rivers in China, such as the Yangtze River (长江).
字形: The character '江' is composed of two parts: the left radical '氵' (water) and the right component '工' (work). The radical indicates its relation to water, while '工' provides phonetic clues.
读音: The pronunciation of '江' is 'jiāng' in Mandarin Chinese.
字源: The character '江' originated from ancient Chinese pictographs representing flowing water. Over time, it evolved into its current form, combining the water radical with the phonetic component '工'.
常用词组: 江山 (jiāng shān - rivers and mountains, often symbolizing the country)
江湖 (jiāng hú - rivers and lakes, often referring to the martial arts world)
成语: 江山如画 (jiāng shān rú huà - the land is picturesque)
江河日下 (jiāng hé rì xià - things are getting worse day by day)
江湖义气 (jiāng hú yì qì - brotherhood in the martial arts world)
例句: 长江是中国最长的河流。 (Cháng Jiāng shì Zhōngguó zuì cháng de héliú. - The Yangtze River is the longest river in China.)
江山如此多娇，引无数英雄竞折腰。 (Jiāng shān rú cǐ duō jiāo, yǐn wú shù yīng xióng jìng zhé yāo. - The land is so beautiful that countless heroes bow in admiration.)
短故事: 传说中，长江是由一条巨龙化成的。这条龙为了拯救干旱的土地，牺牲了自己，化作了长江，滋养了大地。
在古代，有一位诗人站在江边，看着滔滔江水，感叹人生的短暂和自然的永恒，写下了许多流传千古的诗篇。
诗词: 《登高》 - 杜甫: '无边落木萧萧下，不尽长江滚滚来。' (Wú biān luò mù xiāo xiāo xià, bù jìn Cháng Jiāng gǔn gǔn lái. - Endless falling leaves rustle down, the endless Yangtze River rolls on.)

《望庐山瀑布》 - 李白: '日照香炉生紫烟，遥看瀑布挂前川。飞流直下三千尺，疑是银河落九天。' (Rì zhào xiāng lú shēng zǐ yān, yáo kàn pù bù guà qián chuān. Fēi liú zhí xià sān qiān chǐ, yí shì yín hé luò jiǔ tiān. - The sun shines on the incense burner, producing purple smoke, from afar the waterfall hangs before the river. The flying stream plunges three thousand feet, as if the Milky Way were falling from the ninth heaven.)
